cobblemon.species.glacieros.desc1: Glacieros shares a common ancestor with the Rhyhorn family. The horn is encased in ice, which makes up about half of the total body weight of these Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.mockroach.name: Mockroach
cobblemon.species.mockroach.desc1: Mockroach can detach its head and use it as a projectile. Luckily it can survive for up to three months without its head attached, because it tends to lose it.
cobblemon.species.jollibird.name: Jollibird
cobblemon.species.jollibird.desc1: Jollibird will only be in the presence of people who have been nice all year round. Given the nature of human beings, very few people have seen a Jollibird.
cobblemon.species.kablowfish.name: Kablowfish
cobblemon.species.kablowfish.desc1: The inside of Kablowfish's body is so highly pressurized that just touching it can cause it to burst, releasing a large cloud of poisonous gas.
cobblemon.species.scalarva.name: Scalarva
cobblemon.species.scalarva.desc1: Despite its appearance, Scalarva is actually rather docile. It relies on its sharp spikes and scales for protection, only using violence as a last resort.
cobblemon.species.dragalis.name: Dragalis
cobblemon.species.dragalis.desc1: Dragalis's body is composed of solid scales over a dense layer of silk. Its true power slumbers within the innermost layer, waiting to be unleashed.
cobblemon.species.ceregal.name: Ceregal
cobblemon.species.ceregal.desc1: In the distant past, it was believed that anyone capable of taming Ceregal was destined to rule. The pattern on its wings take on the face of a frightening dragon.
cobblemon.species.gargon.name: Gargon
cobblemon.species.gargon.desc1: Gargon is one of the earliest discovered Dragon Pokémon, and was a symbol of the Dragon Tamer Clan in Johto. Statues of this Pokémon are scattered around the world.
cobblemon.species.wardern.name: Wardern
cobblemon.species.wardern.desc1: In ancient times, there was much debate over whether Wardern's ferocity came from its desire to fight evil or it being a vessel for evil itself.
cobblemon.species.dragoyle.name: Dragoyle
cobblemon.species.dragoyle.desc1: Hundreds of years ago, this Pokémon would be perched atop cathedrals and large stone architecture. It seemed to want to protect the inhabitants below.
cobblemon.species.porygonx.name: PorygonX
cobblemon.species.porygonx.desc1: Porygon-X is an upgrade to Porygon, programmed by Professor Thorn. It is designed to translate quantum data between infinite realities.
cobblemon.species.oculeus.name: Oculeus
cobblemon.species.oculeus.desc1: Oculeus exists as an omniscient, universal force. It uses Unown to observe life all over the universe. Once the Unown is done observing, it is absorbed into Oculeus.
cobblemon.species.arkhaos.name: Arkhaos
cobblemon.species.arkhaos.desc1: Arkhaos exists in the void between dimensions, where it lays eggs that spawn Arceus with a new universe. Its rotating ring is used to create rifts in reality.
cobblemon.species.viledoom.name: Viledoom
cobblemon.species.viledoom.desc1: Its rotten pollen have turned into deadly spores. Viledoom live dissacoiated from any other living beings due their spores being too dangerous for any ecosystem.
cobblemon.species.mortossum.name: Mortossum
cobblemon.species.mortossum.desc1: Mortossum managed to rid its body from the poisonous spores. Despite Mortossums destructive past, its will to focus and act towards the greater good has remained.
cobblemon.species.mushling.name: Mushling
cobblemon.species.mushling.desc1: Consuming the spores from this Pokémon has been known to cause psychic hallucinations. It can also lead to nausea and migraines, it is not advised.
cobblemon.species.psycholyte.name: Psycholyte
cobblemon.species.psycholyte.desc1: Upon evolution, this Pokémon goes hunting for a suitable stick. They form a strong bond with the chosen stick and use it to channel its psychic powers.
cobblemon.species.shroomage.name: Shroomage
cobblemon.species.shroomage.desc1: The spores that Shroomage give off have been found to be dangerous. Hallucinations and other symptoms can sometimes last days. Some people believe the spores grant the consumer special powers.
cobblemon.species.calfpint.name: Calfpint
cobblemon.species.calfpint.desc1: They are usually found around their mothers, who are typically raised on farms. It is uncommon to see them by themselves in the wild. When startled, they charge.
cobblemon.species.arbird.name: Arbird
cobblemon.species.arbird.desc1: Arbird are sent off on their own mere hours after hatching, left to fend for themselves. Their dense armor keeps them safe from potential predators.
cobblemon.species.girafaraf.name: Girafaraf
cobblemon.species.girafaraf.desc1: Exposure to the energy of a Dawn Stone has allowed for the front brain to gain full control of itself. The rear brain withers and becomes just a standard tail.
cobblemon.species.giragira.name: Giragira
cobblemon.species.giragira.desc1: Exposure to the energy of a Dusk Stone has strengthened the rear brain of Girafarig. In the process of evolution, the rear brain has convinced the front brain to surrender its power, giving control to the darker half.
cobblemon.species.whave.name: Whave
cobblemon.species.whave.desc1: An outgoing whale Pokémon that generally dwells in the deep seas. It is playful with other Pokémon as long as it's not battling.
cobblemon.species.orcabyss.name: Orcabyss
cobblemon.species.orcabyss.desc1: A ferocious creature that will impale anything that moves too quickly in an aggressive manner. Its horn is strong enough to burrow through glaciers.
cobblemon.species.zapalope.name: Zapalope
cobblemon.species.zapalope.desc1: A Pokémon that zips through dense forests with ease. Its electrical energy allows it to move at high speeds. You can tell a Zapalope trail by the singed edges of the plants around it.
cobblemon.species.joltalope.name: Joltalope
cobblemon.species.joltalope.desc1: A Pokémon that expends high amounts of energy during its active hours. During its resting hours, it sleeps for long periods of time in overgrown forest nests. The foliage starts to take root in Joltalopes fur.
cobblemon.species.mewthree.name: Mewthree
cobblemon.species.mewthree.desc1: Thorn created this creature, via genetic manipulation, using DNA from Mewtwo and Deoxys. It was meant to be a counter to Arkhaos, but has never been put to the test.
cobblemon.species.shyleon.name: Shyleon
cobblemon.species.shyleon.desc1: An exceptionally timid Pokémon always wearing a mask that covers it face. The mask itself seems to be its power source.
cobblemon.species.shyleonterrestrial.des: The Red Energy enhanced its ability to camouflage. It is almost impossible to detect Shyleon in its habitat.
cobblemon.species.shyleonxenoversal.name: Shyleon
cobblemon.species.shyleonxenoversal.desc: It Aquired magic powers after absorbing the Blue Energy. It was revered as a deity by an ancient civilization.
cobblemon.species.shyleonastral.name: Shyleon
cobblemon.species.shyleonastral.desc1: Shyleon's real form. In ancient times, it fought with its brothers alongside Luxflon to defeat the Chaos throughout the universe.
cobblemon.species.shyleonx.name: Shyleon
cobblemon.species.shyleonx.desc1: Made of pure X Energy, this serpentine Pokémon wraps around enemies until it chokes them.
cobblemon.species.trishout.name: Trishout
cobblemon.species.trishout.desc1: Despite its size, it can already shout very loudly. If it cries too much, it becomes voiceless and coughs smoke.
cobblemon.species.trishoutterrestrial.de: It has become more competitive thanks to the Red Energy. It goes wild during battle, releasing scorching flames from its horn.
cobblemon.species.trishoutxenoversal.des: The Blue Energy has given it an overwhelming explosive power. It ejects air from the ports on its body to boost its fiery roars.
cobblemon.species.trishoutastral.name: Trishout
cobblemon.species.trishoutastral.desc1: Trishout's real form. In ancient times, it fought with its brothers alongside Luxflon to defeat the Chaos throughout the universe.
cobblemon.species.trishoutx.name: Trishout
cobblemon.species.trishoutx.desc1: Made of pure X Energy, this Pokémon attacks its enemies ruthlessly until you knock them out.
cobblemon.species.shulong.name: Shulong
cobblemon.species.shulong.desc1: Its blue covering skin is very elastic and can rebound attacks. However, it is extremely sensitive to cold.
cobblemon.species.shulongterrestrial.des: The energy of Planet Earth has turned its skin into a coriaceous armor. After every wound, it comes back harder.
cobblemon.species.shulongxenoversal.name: Shulong
cobblemon.species.shulongxenoversal.desc: Blue Energy has made it vicious and territorial. No one is able to take on it underwater.
cobblemon.species.shulongastral.name: Shulong
cobblemon.species.shulongastral.desc1: Shulong's real form. In ancient times, it fought with its brothers alongside Luxflon to defeat the Chaos throughout the universe.
cobblemon.species.shulongx.name: Shulong
cobblemon.species.shulongx.desc1: Made of pure X Energy, this Pokémon stuns its enemies from behind, then takes advantage of them and hits them relentlessly.
cobblemon.species.persage.name: Persage
cobblemon.species.persage.desc1: It can see the future through its crystal ball. Those who ask it for prediction more than three times will be cursed for life.
cobblemon.species.scovilex.name: ScovileX
cobblemon.species.scovilex.desc1: The Scovile owned by Dimension Colonel Dahlia. When ingested, its seeds will electrocute the body from the inside.
cobblemon.species.electaburst.name: Electaburst
cobblemon.species.electaburst.desc1: The excessive energy unleashed during evolution split up its body. It combines thunders and flares to set off terrible explosions all around.
cobblemon.species.chientilly.name: Chientilly
cobblemon.species.chientilly.desc1: It secretes ice-fresh cream from its tail. If the quality doesn't match its high requirements, it throws that away.
cobblemon.species.dragaliskx.name: DragaliskX
cobblemon.species.dragaliskx.desc1: This being, created to replace the Dark Lord, is a concentration of pure Fury energy. Although it's smaller to the original Dragalisk, it's still very powerful and lethal.
